class="site_search panel_container">\n                    <a class="site_search-icon submenu_trigger icon icon-magglass" data-target-type="search" href="#search">\n                        <span class="screen-readers-only">search</span>\n                    </a>\n                    <div id="search" class="dropdown_panel header_panel">\n                        <div class="search_container">\n                            <div class="search_close icon-searchx icon">\n                            </div>\n                            <form role="search" action="/search" class="active" class="button btn submit"\n                                >\n                            </form>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            </nav>\n        </div>\n    </header>\n</div>\n            </div>\n            <div class="leaderboard-region">\n                <div class="leaderboard-ad-fixed active" id="leaderboard-ad-pane" data-intersection-element="#js-main-content-region" data-intersection-type="bothscroll" data-sticky-callback="true">\n                    <div data-pos="topsticky" data-slot="leader1" class="leaderboard-ad ad leader-board"></div>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n            <div class="mpt-content-header-region">\n                <div data-pos="oop" class="ad ad-adherance hidden-desktop" data-slot="adhesion"> </div>\n                <div class="mpt-content-header">\n  <nav class="mpt-breadcrumb-nav">\n      <a href="/infectiousdisease" itemprop="articleSection" class="mpt-breadcrumb-nav--mpt-nav-item">Infectious Disease</a>\n      <span class="mpt-breadcrumb-nav--mpt-nav-divider">></span>\n      <a href="/infectiousdisease/covid19" class="mpt-breadcrumb-nav--mpt-nav-item">COVID-19</a>\n  </nav>\n  <h1 class="mpt-content-headline">Honoring U.S. Healthcare Workers Who Died From Coronavirus</h1>\n      <h2 class="mpt-content-deck">&mdash; <em>MedPage Today</em> lists those who have lost their lives to COVID-19</h2>\n        <p class="mpt-content-byline">\n      by\n             <a href="https://www.medpagetoday.com/people/kf5618/kristina-fiore">Kristina Fiore</a>, Director of Enterprise &amp; Investigative Reporting, MedPage Today            <span class="mpt-content-date" itemprop="datePublished" content="April 8, 2020">\n        April 8, 2020\n      </span>\n    </p>\n      \n</div>\n            </div>\n            <div class="mpt-left-margin-region"></div>\n            <div class="mpt-content-region">\n                <div itemprop="publisher" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/Organization" style="display: none">\n                    <div itemprop="name">MedpageToday</div>\n                    <div itemprop="logo" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/ImageObject">\n                      <img itemprop="url" src="https://clf1.medpagetoday.net/assets/images/MPT_logo_transparent.svg" alt="">\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n                      <div class="main-content-region" id="js-main-content-region" itemtype="http://schema.org/articleBody" itemid="#main-content-region">\n                                                  <div  class="mpt-social-share" >\n  <div class="mpt-social-share--button-container">\n    <a class="mpt-social-share--button facebook" title="Share this article on Facebook" data-target="social" data-share-type="facebook" href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://www.medpagetoday.com/infectiousdisease/covid19/85867&t=Honoring U.S. Healthcare Workers Who Died From Coronavirus" target="_blank">\n      <span class="screen-readers-only">share to facebook</span>\n    </a>\n  </div>\n  <div class="mpt-social-share--button-container">\n    <a class="mpt-social-share--button twitter" title="Tweet this article" data-target="social" data-share-type="twitter" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?original_referer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.medpagetoday.com%2Finfectiousdisease%2Fcovid19%2F85867&amp;source=tweetbutton&amp;text=Honoring%20U.S.%20Healthcare%20Workers%20Who%20Died%20From%20Coronavirus&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.medpagetoday.com%2Finfectiousdisease%2Fcovid19%2F85867" target="_blank">\n      <span class="screen-readers-only">share to twitter</span>\n    </a>\n  </div>\n  <div class="mpt-social-share--button-container">\n    <a class="mpt-social-share--button href="https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.medpagetoday.com%2Finfectiousdisease%2Fcovid19%2F85867&summary=Honoring U.S. Healthcare Workers Who Died From Coronavirus&source=MedPage%20Today" target="_blank">\n      <span class="screen-readers-only">share to linkedin</span>\n    </a>\n  </div>\n  <div class="mpt-social-share--button-container">\n    <div class="mpt-social-share--button print js-window-print">\n    </div>\n  </div>\n  <div class="mpt-social-share--button-container">\n    <a class="mpt-social-share--button email js-mailto-link">\n      <span class="screen-readers-only">email article</span>\n    </a>\n  </div>\n</div>\n    \n            <div class="mpt-media-container">\n  <img class="mpt-media-container--mpt-image" src="https://clf1.medpagetoday.net/media/images/85xxx/85867.jpg"  alt="An In Memoriam graphic"  />\n  <div style=\'display: none\' itemprop=\'image\' itemscope itemtype=\'https://schema.org/ImageObject\'>\n    <img itemprop=\'url\' src="https://clf1.medpagetoday.net/media/images/85xxx/85867.jpg"  alt="An In Memoriam graphic"  />\n  </div>\n  <span class="block" data-waypoint-leaderboard="1" data-class-container="leaderboard-ad-pane" data-waypoint-down-scroll-only="true" data-remove-class="active"></span>\n  <span class="block" data-waypoint="1" data-swap-container="right-rail" data-waypoint-up-scroll-only="true" data-show-content="right-rail-slide0"></span>\n  <span class="block" data-waypoint-static="1" data-class-container="right-rail-frame" data-waypoint-down-scroll-only="true" data-remove-class="static"></span>\n</div>\n        \n                <p><em>While all life lost during the coronavirus pandemic is invaluable, </em>MedPage Today<em> is highlighting the names of U.S. healthcare workers who have died while working on the front lines.</em></p>\r\n<p><em>This list will be updated regularly. If you would like to add a fallen healthcare worker to this list, please email Kristina Fiore at <a href="mailto:k.fiore@medpagetoday.com" target="_blank">k.fiore@medpagetoday.com</a>.</em></p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><em>Updated Oct. 7, 2020.</em></strong></p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.theangelusfuneralhome.com/obituary/milagros-abellera" target="_blank">Milagros Abellera, RN</a>, Nix Health, San Antonio, Texas</p>\r\n<div class="ad-slot ad box-ad" data-pos="body" data-slot="box"></div><p><a href="https://www.freep.com/story/news/local/2020/04/04/coronavirus-michigan-nurses-die/2943336001/?fbclid=IwAR3pXZJNk3gkmU0rcl3d0AnYTrp9g3irnUCfQ68y9rZNKBQznJAG-odT9vA" target="_blank">Divinia "Debbie" Accad, RN</a>, Detroit VA Medical Center</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.northjersey.com/story/news/bergen/2020/05/28/martin-addison-waldwick-nj-died-covid-19-age-44/5274447002/" target="_blank">Martin Addison</a>, speech pathologist, St. Joseph\'s University Medical Center, Paterson, New Jersey</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.tributearchive.com/obituaries/12899604/ROMEO-AGTARAP" target="_blank">Romeo Agtarap, RN</a>, New York Presbyterian/Columbia Irving Medical Center, New York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.facebook.com/COVID19MedicalMemorial/photos/rev-felicia-ailende-67-registered-nurse-at-bria-of-forest-edge-in-chicago-illino/127019062290663/" target="_blank">Felicia Ailende, RN</a>, nurse, BRIA of Forest Edge, Chicago</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://obits.mlive.com/obituaries/kalamazoo/obituary.aspx?n=nancy-a-ajemian&amp;pid=196084161" target="_blank">Nancy Ajemian, MD</a>, Beaumont Hospital, Grosse Pointe, Michigan</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://abc3340.com/news/coronavirus/tuscaloosa-county-nurse-dies-from-covid-19-complications" target="_blank">Jerry Alford, RN,</a> DCH Northport Medical Center, Alabama</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fthepakistaninewspaper.com%2Fdr-niaz-ali-usa%2F%3Ffbclid%3DIwAR3xgVZjVLI1-mJcrl4s1-ulm7ef7i4O4T3JvVu3imHM96mReTVYUOP5_oM&amp;h=AT1eQQMS4472k9-KUOt5QaKi_5YRJ3WUuOwpkObCuYGFuSCytpf90FC7YQe_dQGurqTD9EhWxMQRyyQKB5C7vgT03Jagd2epYxVzsES7NT1K0bIwJb45aVW6swKN31GFhP2dm4A&amp;__tn__=-UK-R&amp;c%5B0%5D=AT0S-jUaJREL-RSWQGMRHH_0YYPGQkMOxv0siddsq58KjWKGU2Hwi1UjUoW4ounN15bcgYyp6bjEW6F2bJKnXPKDRzapZAw5wIij_1l2HMgZSNj9pYPBQXOLGkUji9642Lf8XPw2TAHwxUBZ4io5jUZcLdY86RqfybwTD6qDDW0Da2TikYdrOA" target="_blank">Niaz Ali, MD, Riverview Medical Center, New Jersey</a></p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.nola.com/news/coronavirus/article_1deda660-7460-11ea-a260-7f9979779d87.html" target="_blank">Larrice Anderson, RN</a>, New Orleans East Hospital</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://hispanicnewsnetwork.blogspot.com/2020/05/milwaukee-southside-doctor-leonardo-j.html?m=1&amp;fbclid=IwAR0GVdrqY1iiLWlYFdtHCRHglTxXB_bpzGgkB336YVRnyWFY-o1xYWxEDIA" target="_blank">Leonardo Aponte, MD,</a> Cl&iacute;nica Latina, Wisconsin</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.legacy.com/obituaries/elpasotimes/obituary.aspx?n=robert-bobby-armstrong-bob&amp;pid=196415558&amp;fhid=28962" target="_blank">Robert Armstrong, NP</a>, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, El Paso, Texas</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/glendale-ny/earline-austin-9112840" target="_blank">Earline Austin, MD,</a> Staten Island University Hospital, New York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://cleavonmd.com/nicanor-nick-baltazar-an-rn-and-director-of-nursing-from-long-island-care-center-in-flushing-ny/" target="_blank">Nicanor "Nick" Baltazar, RN</a>, Long Island Care Center, Flushing, New York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.recordnet.com/news/20200403/nurse-at-st-josephs-medical-center-dies-of-coronavirus-complications" target="_blank">Jeff Baumbach, RN</a>, St. Joseph\'s Medical Center, Stockton, California</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.sun-sentinel.com/coronavirus/fl-ne-broward-nurse-earl-bailey-20200407-tud6477zkbfxxagkzhfvkibvyy-story.html" target="_blank">Earl Bailey, RN</a>, Broward County, Florida</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.kcur.org/2020-04-22/a-kansas-city-nurse-who-raised-concerns-about-a-lack-of-protective-equipment-dies-of-covid-19" target="_blank">Celia Yap Banago, RN</a>, Research Medical Center, Kansas City, Missouri</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.brooklynpaper.com/coney-island-mourns-alex-bass/" target="_blank">Alex Bass, </a>physician assistant, NYC Health + Hospitals/Coney Island, New York</p>\r\n<div class="ad-slot ad box-ad" data-pos="body" data-slot="box"></div><p><a Connecticut</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.legacy.com/obituaries/nytimes/obituary.aspx?n=hooshang-behroozi&amp;pid=196019976" target="_blank">Hooshang Behroozi, MD,</a> pediatrician, New York City</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/jupiter-fl/adam-bianchini-9314835" target="_blank">Adam Bianchini, MD</a>, internal medicine, West Palm Beach, Florida</p>\r\n<p><a Robert Wood Johnson University Hospital, New Brunswick, New Jersey</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.legacy.com/obituaries/northjersey/obituary.aspx?n=ronald-brisman&amp;pid=196141000" H. Brutus, MD,</a> Brookdale Hospital, New York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2020-05-01/coronavirus-silverado-nurse-death" target="_blank">Brittany Bruner-Ringo,</a> nurse, Los Angeles</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.legacy.com/obituaries/hartfordcourant/obituary.aspx?n=santo-buccheri&amp;pid=196439133&amp;fhid=4082" target="_blank">Santo Buccheri, MD</a>, private practice, Hartford, Connecticut</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.kavodacharon.com/bios-memory/rabbi-dr-shalom-buchbinder" target="_blank">Shalom Buchbinder, MD</a>, radiologist, New York</p>\r\n<p><a Michigan</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.local10.com/news/local/2020/04/09/longtime-south-florida-doctor-dies-from-coronavirus-complications/" target="_blank">Luis Caldera Nieves, MD</a>, gynecologist, Miami, Florida</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.baltimoresun.com/coronavirus/bs-md-evelyn-caro-20200415-7ztrj4wprbfbfck7iagnxww7wq-story.html" target="_blank">Evelyn Caro, RN</a>, Holy Cross Hospital, Maryland</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/09/obituaries/ricardo-castaneda-dead-coronavirus.html?smid=fb-share" target="_blank">Ricardo Castaneda, MD</a>, psychiatrist, New York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://journalism.berkeley.edu/projects/those-weve-lost-rosary-celaya-castro-olega/" target="_blank">Rosary Celaya Castro-Olega, RN</a>, Los Angeles, California</p>\r\n<p><a practice, New Jersey</p>\r\n<p><a Corpus Christi, Texas</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.courier-journal.com/story/news/2020/07/09/after-2-quarantines-covid-19-still-found-way-kill-louisville-nurse/5398797002/" target="_blank">Dana Davis, RN</a>, Baptist Health, Louisville, Kentucky</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.fox5ny.com/news/queens-mural-of-doctor-who-died-of-covid-pays-tribute-to-immigrant-health-care-workers" target="_blank">Leo Dela Cruz, MD,</a> Christ Hospital, New Jersey</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.gofundme.com/f/in-loving-memory-of-ernesto-deleon" target="_blank">Ernesto DeLeon, RN</a>, Bellevue Hospital, New York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.reviewjournal.com/local/local-las-vegas/dedicated-las-vegas-nurse-with-big-heart-killed-by-covid-19-at-39-2098596/" target="_blank">Vincent DeJesus, RN</a>, Sunrise Hospital, Las Vegas, Nevada</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.echovita.com/us/obituaries/nj/new-milford/rowena-dellosa-11061280" target="_blank">Rowena Dellosa, RN</a>, Montefiore Medical Center, Bronx, New York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2020/07/22/obituaries/samantha-diaz-dead-coronavirus.html" target="_blank">Samantha Diaz</a>, medical assistant, Florida</p>\r\n<p><a Rehabilitation Center, Austin, Texas</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.elpasotimes.com/story/news/local/community/2020/04/30/el-paso-nurse-karla-dominguez-coronavirus-online-virtual-vigil/3054207001/" MD</a>, geriatrician, New York</p>\r\n<div class="ad-slot ad box-ad" data-pos="body" data-slot="box"></div><p><a href="https://www.legacy.com/obituaries/name/orlando-espinoza-obituary?pid=196125888&amp;view=guestbook" target="_blank">Orlando Espinoza, MD</a>, family practitioner, Broward County, Florida</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.fox2detroit.com/news/henry-ford-hospital-nurse-lisa-ewald-dies-of-covid-19" target="_blank">Lisa Ewald, RN</a>, Henry Ford Hospital, Detroit</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.cnn.com/2020/09/22/us/houston-adeline-fagan-covid-19-death/index.html" target="_blank">Adeline Fagan, MD</a>, ob/gyn resident, Houston</p>\r\n<p><a Medicine, Odessa, Texas</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.northjersey.com/story/news/coronavirus/2020/05/24/waldwick-nj-family-physician-coronavirus-inspired-many-doctors-nurses/5228875002/" target="_blank">Jessie Ariel Ferreras, MD</a>, Valley Medical Group, Waldwick, New Jersey</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://obits.silive.com/obituaries/siadvance/obituary.aspx?n=david-w-finn&amp;pid=196414694&amp;fbclid=IwAR2LXAJPhSG3qf7UMi4MzxqqJ-ynXPGT5irmaT-a95a7XrDFHgt5Kj4YrIs" target="_blank">David Finn, MD</a>, medical director, opioid treatment at Water Street, New York</p>\r\n<p><a MD</a>, psychiatrist, New Orleans</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.inquirer.com/obituaries/howard-snyder-chop-doctor-covid-19-coronavirus-obituary-20200618.html?fbclid=IwAR06ng_WZ9JA-eCIUDJC11o-HUxl24HRpv7T4VFKDAoJfC8guQcqP9F6y4k" target="_blank">Howard Snyder III, MD</a>, Children\'s Hospital of Philadelphia</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.legacy.com/obituaries/seattletimes/obituary.aspx?n=joshua-yasuo-suzuki&amp;pid=196080157&amp;" target="_blank">Joshua Suzuki, MD</a>, ob/gyn, Seattle</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.asianjournal.com/usa/lasvegas/unwilling-to-retire-81-year-old-filipino-doctor-in-las-vegas-practiced-until-he-died-from-covid-19/" target="_blank">Arthrur Sydeco Tayengco, MD</a>, ob/gyn, Las Vegas</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.legacy.com/obituaries/latimes/obituary.aspx?n=danny-w-thomas&amp;pid=196715948&amp;fbclid=IwAR3qk2A8ikjVz2up2W25VPocC8wjE7L94QhzfjoqmWINWQPm1t95dQMdj9I" target="_blank">Danny Thomas, MD</a>, Children\'s Hospital, Los Angeles</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.gofundme.com/f/supporting-adlin-thompsons-family" target="_blank">Adlin Thompson</a>, NewYork-Presbyterian Hospital and Isabella Center for Nursing and Rehabilitation, New York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/fort-lauderdale-fl/carlos-vallejo-9295988" target="_blank">Carlos Vallejo, MD</a>, private practice, Weston, Florida</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://miami.cbslocal.com/2020/08/06/coronavirus-takes-heavy-toll-on-family-of-cbs4-reporter-jessica-vallejo/" target="_blank">Jorge Vallejo, MD</a>, retired, Miami</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.nj.com/bergen/2020/04/nj-hospital-worker-known-for-his-unforgettable-smile-dies-from-coronavirus.html" target="_blank">Jesus Villaluz</a>, patient transport services, Holy Name Medical Center, Teaneck, New Jersey</p>\r\n<p>Thua Vin, MD, pediatrician, Orange County, California</p>\r\n<div class="ad-slot ad box-ad" data-pos="body" data-slot="box"></div><p><a href="https://www.nbclosangeles.com/news/coronavirus/nursing-student-dies-after-contracting-coronavirus-at-riverside-facility/2344980/" href="https://www.pleasantmanorfh.com/obituary/Guido-Volcovici?fbclid=IwAR0VHWqMF8ZlNcjoHpUn4Hda1PCmDdoHAvZ0PIg0ewsTNtHxdyxXASBtmtQ" target="_blank">Guido Volcovici, MD,</a> pulmonologist, lower Westchester County, New York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2020/05/06/obituaries/Dr-barry-webber-dead-coronavirus.html" target="_blank">Gary Webber, MD</a>, general surgeon, Mount Sinai Queens, New York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://obits.nj.com/obituaries/starledger/obituary.aspx?n=robert-harris-weitzman&amp;pid=196052074" target="_blank">Robert Harris Weitzman, MD</a>, retired pulmonologist, New Jersey</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.theadvocate.com/baton_rouge/news/coronavirus/article_c2b7dd12-96e0-11ea-9ff8-9ff8faef31c2.html" target="_blank">Shenetta White-Ballard</a>, nurse, Legacy Nursing and Rehabilitation, Port Allen, Louisiana</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://massapequafuneralhome.com/obituary/kenneth-whitney/" target="_blank">Kenneth Whitney, PA</a>, NYU Winthrop, Massapequa Park, New York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/coronavirus-georgia-mom-who-worked-hospital-found-dead-home-her-n1168386" target="_blank">Diedre Wilkes</a>, mammogram technologist, Newnan, Georgia</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://tulsaworld.com/news/local-nurse-practitioner-dies-after-four-month-battle-with-covid-19/article_f4bcb096-562a-5de3-b75c-71763b8346b3.html" target="_blank">Aimee Williams, NP</a>, ICU specialist, Tulsa, Oklahoma</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.gofundme.com/f/petal-williams" target="_blank">Petal Williams-Richards</a>, respiratory therapist, BronxCare Health System</p>\r\n<p><a href="http://www.stlamerican.com/news/local_news/nurse-judy-wilson-griffin-is-first-covid%20--%20death-in/article_1d422bea-6b06-11ea-83e1-17bbd703c8fb.html" target="_blank">Judy Wilson-Griffin, RN</a>, St. Mary\'s Hospital, St. Louis</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.wnem.com/news/sandusky-woman-who-beat-stage-3-4-cancer-dies-from-covid-19-complications/article_ad144064-8f37-11ea-adca-93957c2bc516.html" target="_blank">Samantha Wissinger</a>, RN, Sandusky, Michigan</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://newyork.cbslocal.com/2020/04/08/coronavirus-brooklyn-doctor-david-wolin-dies/" target="_blank">David Wolin, MD</a>, radiologist, The Brooklyn Hospital Center, New York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://www.legacy.com/amp/obituaries/nytimes/196147288" target="_blank">Sina Zaim, MD</a>, Hackensack University Medical Center, New Jersey</p>\r\n<p><a York</p>\r\n<p><a href="https://obits.nola.com/obituaries/nola/obituary.aspx?pid=195880049" target="_blank">Jack Zoller, MD</a>, ob/gyn, New Orleans</p>\n            <div class="last-updated">Last Updated October 07, 2020</div>\n                <div class="author-info">\n            <ul class="author-info--list">\n                                                <li class="author-info--list-item">\n                                                    <div class="author-info--list-item-img">\n                                <img src="https://clf1.medpagetoday.com/media/images/author/kristinaFiore_188.jpg" alt="author[\'full_name\']">\n                            </div>\n                                                <div class="author-info--list-item-copy">\n                            <p><a href="https://www.medpagetoday.com/people/kf5618/kristina-fiore">Kristina Fiore</a> leads MedPage\xe2\x80\x99s enterprise &amp; investigative reporting team. She\xe2\x80\x99s been a medical journalist for more than a decade and her work has been recognized by Barlett &amp; Steele, AHCJ, SABEW, and others. Send story tips to k.fiore@medpagetoday.com.  <a href="https://twitter.com/KristinaMFiore" class="author-info--list-item-copy-social">Follow <span><object &amp; investigative reporting team. Her work has been recognized by Barlett &amp; Steele, the New York Press Club, the Society of American Business Editors &amp; Writers, the Association of Health Care Journalists, and others. She has covered clinical news across several specialties for more than a decade and has had numerous bylines in both professional and consumer health publications.
